input.description:
For example: BMC_AR_System
Refer to BMC-SA-Event_Orchestration_Configuration:Generic:ITSMType and its documentation.
All configuration from defined in the module BMC-SA-Event_Orchestration_Configuration:Specifics
Event data to be attaced to the ticket.

Current status of processing. For example:
<flags> <continue-processing>true</continue-processing> <status>success</status> <change-enabled>true</change-enabled> <incident-enabled>true</incident-enabled> <remediation-enabled>true</remediation-enabled> </flags>

For example: BMC_TrueSight
Refer to BMC-SA-Event_Orchestration_Configuration:Generic:EventSourceType and its documentation.

Any existing ITSM data from the event like below:
<itsm-data> <itsm-incident-id>INC000000000469</itsm-incident-id> </itsm-data>
Authorization token used to perform actions in target ITSM

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//event-source-incident-integration-enabled/text() = 'true'"> <incident-create-enabled> <xsl:value-of select="'false'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </incident-create-enabled> <incident-update-enabled> <xsl:value-of select="//incident-enabled/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </incident-update-enabled> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <incident-create-enabled> <xsl:value-of select="//incident-enabled/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </incident-create-enabled> <incident-update-enabled> <xsl:value-of select="//incident-enabled/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </incident-update-enabled> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//*[name() = '${itsm type}']/WebServiceConnectionData/Password/*)"> <xsl:copy-of select="//*[name() = '${itsm type}']/WebServiceConnectionData/Password/*" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <password> <xsl:value-of select="//BMC_AR_System/WebServiceConnectionData/Password/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </password> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <new-element> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${urgency}')<=0"> <xsl:value-of select="//*[name() = '${itsm type}']/IncidentManagementDefaults/DefaultUrgency" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${urgency}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </new-element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Incident Exists. Going to update the WorkInfo.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' != 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="//message/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text></xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="//metadata/error-message/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text></xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="//metadata/error/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text></xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space(//metadata/error/text())) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="//metadata/error/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space(//error-message/text())) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="//error-message/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//metadata/request-type/text() = 'Create Incident'"> <xsl:value-of select="//response-data/incident-id/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//response-data/incident-id/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = //metadata/status/text()">${status}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'failure'">${status}</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//metadata/status/text() = 'failure'"> <xsl:value-of select="//metadata/status/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${status}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:variable name="errorMsg">$[error message]</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(//metadata/error/text())) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="//metadata/error/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(//error-message/text())) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="//error-message/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space($errorMsg)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="$errorMsg" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text></xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//metadata/request-type/text() = 'Create Incident'"> <xsl:value-of select="//response-data/incident-id/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//response-data/incident-id/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This a process template. It has a few basic things. 1. Log Input 2. Log Output 3. Atleast 2 basic output parameters - status and error message.
